author: Sarah Perez
title: Niantic is updating Pokémon Go and other titles to support indoor gaming
description: Niantic, the development company behind popular AR mobile games Pokémon Go and Harry Potter: Wizards Unite, is adapting its titles to support at-home gaming in response to the COVID-19 pandemic. Typically, Niantic’s games have encouraged people to go outdoors…
